item.title: [PI] ::Yell [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerRights == 0) { String rank = ""; String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase(); if (c.isDonator == 1) { rank = "[Donator] ["+ c.playerName +"]:"; } for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(rank+Message); } } }

Just remove the Donator part. Please remember to put this were it goes.
